content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (0, 0)
Consists of steam engine (position (0, 0)), boiler (position (0, 1)), and offshore pump (position (0, 2))

### Copper plate mine at position (1, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (1, 0)) and a furnace at position (1, 1)
- Burner mining drill (position (1, 2)) and a furnace at position (1, 3)
- Burner mining drill (position (1, 4)) and a furnace at position (1, 5)

### Copper cable factory at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (2, 1) and inserter at position (2, 2) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position (2, 3)) that connects the furnace at position (1, 1) to the assembling machine at position (2, 1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting without enough resources
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients before attempting to craft an item. For example, crafting an iron gear wheel requires 2 iron plates, which must be available in your inventory or produced in a furnace.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. 

### Errors related to crafting machines
- Check that the required crafting machine or furnace is available and operational before attempting to craft items that depend on them.
